Class GameCharacters

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.GameCharacters
public class GameCharacters extends CharacterCard
GameCharacter class modelling the character that modifies the state of the game

    • GameCharacters

  • Method Details

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(CharacterStruct params)
      This method overrides the standard behaviour of the CharacterCard class, parent of GameCharacters, by implementing all the game effects concerning the change of state of the current game
      Overrides:
      applyEffect in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      params - A struct containing all the object modifiable by any effect. This makes the applyEffect method in all the different child class have the same signature, thus making it interchangeable

    • removeEffect

      public void removeEffect(CharacterStruct params)
      This method overrides the standard behaviour of the CharacterCard class, parent of GameCharacters, by removing all the game effects concerning the change of state of the current game. It removes only those effects that need it but still has a case for each possible effect to ensure complete interchangeability
      Overrides:
      removeEffect in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      params - A struct containing all the object modifiable by any effect. This makes the removeEffect method in all the different child class have the same signature, thus making it interchangeable

    • falseNatureMovementEffect

      private void falseNatureMovementEffect(Game currentGame, int motherNatureMoves, MainBoard board)
      This method implements the Character Card used to simulate the movement of Mother Nature and thus the possible conquering of an island
      Parameters:
      currentGame - The current Game object
      motherNatureMoves - The number of moves Mother Nature has to take
      board - The game's main board object

    • takeProfessorEqualEffect

      private void takeProfessorEqualEffect(Game currentGame)
      This method implements the Character Card used to take control of a professor even when the players have the same number of students in the dining room of one color
      Parameters:
      currentGame - The current game object

    • noTakeProfessorEqualEffect

      private void noTakeProfessorEqualEffect(Game currentGame)
      This method removes the effect of the Character Card used to take control of a professor even when the players have the same number of students in the dining room of one color
      Parameters:
      currentGame - The current game object
